title: [Large-scale] Immersive Workshop on Solving Mathematical Problems Using Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts (equations, geometry)
context.additional_context: Accessibility-focused learning environment configuration using mobile VR devices (smartphone-mounted)

learning_goals: Learners can solve 3D spatial geometry problems in VR environments with 80% accuracy

Within a week, learners complete assignments applying three abstract math concepts (e.g., differentiation, integration, matrix transformation) to real-world business scenarios (production line optimization, data modeling) in VR environments and achieve a "B" (70%+) grade in four of five rubric items.
Achieve over 90% participation by utilizing VR collaboration tools during team-based project execution

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
